tweet: I spend so much time in my office chair writing that I thought I'd start doing sit ups, but didn't expect to pull a muscle in my neck. Ouch!
I guess that shows I totally am out of shape.  I can't turn my neck.  Where's my motrin!  Where's my massous?
Okay-I think I've finished plotting book two.  Sigh of relief.  Now onto research, my favorite part!
Like Historical Romance? My A Soldier's Embrace is now at Barnes&Nobel.com for 12.99!
